subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: Dustin Byfuglien scored a power-play goal with 5 minutes 55 seconds left in the third period, breaking a 2-2 tie, as the Blackhawks beat the Sharks in four games in the Western Conference finals.
snippet: Dustin Byfuglien scored a power-play goal with 5 minutes 55 seconds left in the third period, breaking a 2-2 tie, as the Blackhawks beat the Sharks in four games in the Western Conference finals.
